PREPPhrase:
take control of 控制
out of control 失去控制

in harness with sb. 与某人密切合作
refrain from doing sth. 克制做某事

a large amount of 大量的
amount to 总计....

sum sth. up 总结
sum sb./sth. up 简而言之
in proportion to... 与...成比例

at any rate 反正
at the rate of 以...的比率
at this rate 既然这样

be concern with... 与...有关
be/become concerned about 关系
as/so far as...be concerned 就...而言

at all events 不管怎样
in any event 不管怎样
in the event 结果
in the event that 假如

a trifle 稍微
trifle with 轻视
resign oneself to doing sth. 使自已顺从于做某事
quit doing sth. 停止做某事
depart from... 从...出发

link sth. to... 连接
link up 连接

be connect with 与...有关系
connect to 连接
be relate to... 与...有关

attach to 使依恋
be attach to 附属于

persist in doing sth. 坚持做某事
persist with sth.继续做某事
insist on/upon doing sth. 坚持做某事

in the absence of 缺乏
absence of mind 心不在焉

at present 目前
for the present 目前
up the present 直到现在

under no circumstance 决不
in/under the circumstance 在这种情况下

be in good condition 情况良好
on condition that 条件是....
out of condition 健康状况不佳

by  force 靠武力
come into force 实施
force...on... 把...强加在...上

be oblige to do sth. 迫使做某事
be oblige to sb. 感激某人
revolve around 将...作为主要兴趣

apply to sb. for 向某人申请
apply...to 把...应用于
apply to 适用于
apply oneself to 致力于

beyond measure 无可估量
take measure 采取措施
for good measure 作为额外添加
measure up 达到预期要求

for the purpose of 为了...
on purpose 故意的
with the purpose of... 为了...

advise doing sth. 建议做某事
advise sb. to do sth. 建议某人做某事

a piece of advice 一条建议
ask for one's advice 向某人征求意见
give sb. some advice on sth. 对某人在某方面提出劝告
accept/take/follow one's advice 接收某人的建议
give advice on... 就...提出建议
recommend doing sth. 建议做某事

persuade sb. into/ouf of doing sth. 说服某人做/不做某事

convince sb. of...
convince sb. that... 使某人相信
